mapper.insert: INSERT INTO broker(cluster_name, broker_name, broker_id, address, version, dc, last_update_time) VALUES (#{clusterName}, #{brokerName}, #{brokerId}, #{address}, #{version}, #{dc}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE broker SET last_update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE cluster_name = #{clusterName} AND broker_name = #{brokerName} AND broker_id = #{brokerId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) > 0 FROM broker WHERE cluster_name = #{clusterName} AND broker_name = #{brokerName} AND broker_id = #{brokerId}
